episodes.title: Juror speaks to 8 News Now after Nathan Chasing Horse found guilty on 13 counts including sexual assault
episodes.description: 8 News Now spoke with Christine Schaffer, the jury foreperson, following the reading of the verdict on Friday. She described some of the evidence as upsetting, but said the jury was determined to remain fair.

episodes.title: Jury reaction to Nathan Chasing Horse verdict
episodes.description: 8 News Now's Ryan Tisminezky spoke with a jury foreperson on how the jury came to their verdict that was announced on Friday at the Regional Justice Center in Downtown Las Vegas.

episodes.title: Jury finds Nathan Chasing Horse guilty on 13 counts including sexual assault of a minor
episodes.description: Jurors convicted Nathan Chasing Horse on 10 counts of sexual assault on a minor, returning guilty verdicts on 13 of 21 counts in the actor's trial on Friday.

episodes.title: Ice Deportation & The Chasing Horse Trial | The Investigators
episodes.description: Ice Deportation & The Chasing Horse Trial | The Investigators

episodes.title: Closing statements of Nathan Chasing Horse sexual abuse trial
episodes.description: Closing arguments in the Nathan Chasing Horse trial ended Wednesday night in a Las Vegas courtroom. Jurors heard from both sides before they deliberated. Jurors will return to the courtroom on Thursday at 10 a.m.

episodes.title: Defense rests in Las Vegas trial of accused sex predator Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: A Las Vegas judge told jurors in the trial of Nathan Chasing Horse that the case would be in their hands Wednesday afternoon after the defense rested its case Tuesday.

episodes.title: Day 4: Nathan Chasing Horse trial; alleged victim’s mother takes the stand
episodes.description: The jury in the Nathan Chasing Horse sexual assault trial heard from the state’s key witness, Corena Leone-LaCroix, an alleged victim in the case, on Friday.

episodes.title: Day 3 of Nathan Chasing Horse sexual abuse trial
episodes.description: The trial of Nathan Chasing Horse is scheduled to resume on Thursday at 1 p.m., and more witnesses are expected to take the stand.

episodes.title: Day 2: The trial of Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description:
Opening statements in the Nathan Chasing Horse trial began on Tuesday.
Chasing Horse, 49, is charged with 21 counts related to sexual abuse against three alleged victims, two when they were underage.

episodes.title: Las Vegas jurors view alleged sex-abuse video in Nathan Chasing Horse trial
episodes.description: Jurors saw graphic video in the trial of Nathan Chasing Horse, which prosecutors said shows him sexually abusing a girl under the age of 14. The 'Dances with Wolves' actor appeared to look away as the video played on courtroom monitors Tuesday.

episodes.title: Opening statements in trial of Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse, 49, is charged with 21 counts in connection with the alleged sexual abuse against three women, two of them when they were underage. If convicted, he could face life in prison.

episodes.title: Jury selected in 'Dances with Wolves' actor Nathan Chasing Horse case
episodes.description: Jury selection in the trial against Nathan Chasing Horse concluded Friday as 16 Clark County residents were chosen to possibly decide the fate of the 'Dances with Wolves' actor.

episodes.title: Reporting Nathan Chasing Horse: Alleged victim recalls skepticism from police
episodes.description: A woman who said she is one of the victims identified in charges against Nathan Chasing Horse in Canada shared her story with the 8 News Now Investigators. Janessa Lambert said the "Dances with Wolves" actor sexually assaulted her in her British Columbia home in 2018 after she had broken up with him.

episodes.title: Sex trafficking: Woman claims she is a survivor of 'Dances with Wolves' actor
episodes.description: Another woman has come forward with claims of sexual abuse against "Dances with Wolves" actor Nathan Chasing Horse. Kayla Onespot told the 8 News Now Investigators she is also a survivor of sex trafficking orchestrated by Chasing Horse.

episodes.title: Sex abuse allegations for years: court docs in Nathan Chasing Horse case reveal criminal justice sys
episodes.description: Multiple girls and women previously reported that Nathan Chasing Horse sexually abused them for nearly two decades, but their reports did not result in criminal charges.

episodes.title: Chasing Horse pleads not guilty in Las Vegas child sex crimes case
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse pleaded not guilty and invoked his right to a speedy trial Wednesday. The "Dances with Wolves" actor is accused of victimizing indigenous underage girls and women.

episodes.title: Las Vegas grand jury indicts Nathan Chasing Horse for ‘years of sexual abuse’
episodes.description:
A Clark County grand jury indicted “Dances With Wolves” actor Nathan Chasing Horse weeks after a judge ordered his original case dismissed.
https://www.8newsnow.com/investigators/las-vegas-grand-jury-indicts-nathan-chasing-horse-on-new-sex-assault-charges/

episodes.title: 'We did not forget,' alleged Chasing Horse victim attends latest court appearance
episodes.description:
Accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse appeared in North Las Vegas Justice court Wednesday morning on new charges related to child abuse material.
The “Dances with Wolves” actor was in court after the Nevada Supreme Court dismissed a previous indictment and a district court judge ordered his release.

episodes.title: Prosecutors file new charges against Nathan Chasing Horse as Las Vegas judge orders his release
episodes.description: Prosecutors filed new child sexual abuse charges against "Dances With Wolves" actor Nathan Chasing Horse the same day a judge ordered his release in his now-dismissed case, the 8 News Now Investigators have learned.

episodes.title: Prosecutors to refile charges against Nathan Chasing Horse after Nevada Supreme Court dismissal
episodes.description: Clark County District Attorney Steve Wolfson said his office would refile charges against Nathan Chasing Horse, hours after the Nevada Supreme Court dismissed the case, calling the court's ruling a "minor setback."

episodes.title: Court orders dismissal of Chasing Horse sex abuse case
episodes.description: Court orders dismissal of Chasing Horse sex abuse case

episodes.title: Accused sex predator Nathan Chasing Horse gets another chance at Nevada Supreme Court
episodes.description: The Nevada Supreme Court will reconsider a request from accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse to dismiss the charges against him.

episodes.title: Accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse files third appeal
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse, the "Dances with Wolves" actor accused of victimizing indigenous underage girls and women for nearly two decades, has filed a third appeal to the Nevada Supreme Court.

episodes.title: Nevada Supreme Court denies Nathan Chasing Horse's second appeal
episodes.description: The Nevada Supreme Court denied a second appeal from accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse on Tuesday after the "Dances with Wolves" actor asked Nevada's highest court to drop the charges against him.

episodes.title: Las Vegas crimes case against actor Nathan Chasing Horse continues to stall
episodes.description: A hearing for the Las Vegas criminal case against accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse was rescheduled Monday. The "Dances with Wolves" actor is asking the Nevada Supreme Court to drop the charges against him a second time after his first attempt failed.

episodes.title: Nevada Supreme Court declines to drop charges against Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: The Nevada Supreme Court denied a petition filed by accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse. He will still be charged with 18 counts related to the alleged sexual abuse against two women in Clark County.

episodes.title: Alleged victims of Nathan Chasing Horse in Las Vegas case await Nevada Supreme Court decision
episodes.description: Ren Leone recalled listening to oral arguments at the Nevada Supreme Court on Nov. 15, as an attorney for Nathan Chasing Horse, the man accused of sexually abusing her pushed for the charges against him to be dropped.

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse appears to communicate with supporters in Las Vegas court appearance
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse appeared briefly in a Las Vegas courtroom on Monday where he smiled and appeared to communicate with supporters.

episodes.title: 'No question that he is guilty,' police sergeant says of Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse used his position as a self-proclaimed "Medicine Man" to sexually abuse individuals who had placed their trust in him, according to the Tsuut'Ina Nation Police Service.

episodes.title: Chasing Horse faces new warrants in Canada, remains in jail in Las Vegas
episodes.description:
Nathan Chasing Horse faces additional criminal charges for sex crimes in Canada, the 8 News Now Investigators have learned.
Tssut’Ina Nation Police Service announced applications for four arrest warrants on Tuesday. At least one allegation dates back to 2005.

episodes.title: Chasing Horse jury trial remains on hold during wait for NV Supreme Court’s decision
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse briefly appeared in a Las Vegas courtroom one day after asking the Nevada Supreme Court to drop an indictment against him. A jury trial case remains on hold until the Nevada Supreme Court makes a decision.

episodes.title: Chasing Horse appeals to Nevada Supreme Court, says alleged sex abuse victim, 14, never said 'no'
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse is asking the Nevada Supreme Court to dismiss all charges against him, arguing in part that a then-14-year-old girl did not testify that she said "no" to a "sexual encounter."

episodes.title: Chasing Horse's jury trial delayed as defense attorney attempts again to get case dismissed
episodes.description: The jury trial for accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse is on hold.  His jury trial was scheduled to begin on Monday, May 1, but prosecutors and the defense agreed to delay the date while Chasing Horse's defense attorney continues to attempt to get all of the charges against him dropped.

episodes.title: 'It's torture,' Mother of alleged Chasing Horse victim says she lives with guilt
episodes.description: The mother of a woman at the center of the Las Vegas criminal case against accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse said she regrets her devotion to the "Dances With Wolves" actor.

episodes.title: 'I am one of the victims,’ Woman describes Nathan Chasing Horse’s alleged abuse
episodes.description: A woman at the center of the Las Vegas criminal case against accused sexual predator Nathan Chasing Horse sat down with the 8 News Now Investigators to share her story.

episodes.title: Las Vegas judge drops drug charge against Nathan Chasing Horse, sex crimes charges remain
episodes.description: A judge ordered that a drug trafficking charge against Nathan Chasing Horse will be dropped while 18 charges related to sex crimes will remain, according to an order obtained by the 8 News Now Investigators.

episodes.title: Chasing Horse attorney calls alleged assaults 'transactional sex'
episodes.description: "Dances with Wolves" actor Nathan Chasing Horse was in Clark County District Court Wednesday to address filings from his defense team.

episodes.title: Nathan Chasing Horse seeks information about ‘alternative suspect’
episodes.description: Nathan Chasing Horse seeks information about ‘alternative suspect’

episodes.title: Chasing Horse pleads ‘not guilty’ in sex crimes case
episodes.description: It was a packed courtroom for Nathan Chasing Horse’s Wednesday morning arraignment on numerous sexual assault charges in Clark County District Court.

episodes.title: Chasing Horse pleads 'not guilty' in sex crimes case
episodes.description: It was a packed courtroom for Nathan Chasing Horse's Wednesday morning arraignment on numerous sexual assault charges in Clark County District Court.

episodes.title: Medicine Man or Con Man? New allegations against Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: A father has come forward to share his story about a journey to try to save his son from cancer and what he calls a promise from Nathan Chasing Horse.

episodes.title: Petition to keep ‘Dances with Wolves’ actor behind bars
episodes.description: There is an online petition to try to prevent Nathan Chasing Horse from being released from custody. The “Dances with Wolves” actor remains in the Clark County Detention Center in downtown Las Vegas where he has been in custody since his arrest on Jan. 30.

episodes.title: Chasing Horse indicted on 19 charges, most related to alleged sexual assault of girls under 16
episodes.description: A grand jury in Las Vegas has indicted former actor Nathan Chasing Horse on 19 charges of sexual assault, most of the charges involving victims under 16. The indictment was announced in court Wednesday morning.

episodes.title: Another warrant issued for 'Dances with Wolves' actor Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: A warrant has been issued in Montana for Nathan Chasing Horse, the former "Dances with Wolves" actor accused in a sexual predator investigation. The charge -- aggravated sexual assault of a child -- was filed in Fort Peck Tribal Court. The warrant was signed by a judge on Feb. 10, the 8 News Now Investigators have learned.

episodes.title: Another warrant issued for 'Dances with Wolves' actor Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: A warrant has been issued in Montana for Nathan Chasing Horse, the former "Dances with Wolves" actor accused in a sexual predator investigation. The charge -- aggravated sexual assault of a child -- was filed in Fort Peck Tribal Court. The warrant was signed by a judge on Feb. 10, the 8 News Now Investigators have learned.

episodes.title: Ally of accused child rapist Nathan Chasing Horse heads anti-human trafficking program
episodes.description: An ally of accused child rapist Nathan Chasing Horse heads a program to combat human trafficking, the 8 News Now Investigators have learned. Jennifer McQuaid, also known as Jennifer Diaz-McQuaid has been the coordinator for "Seeds of Hope," an anti-human trafficking program at The Salvation Army in southern Nevada.

episodes.title: North Las Vegas judge sets $300K bail for actor Nathan Chasing Horse accused of grooming, raping you
episodes.description: A judge set bail at $300,000 for Nathan Chasing Horse at a Wednesday court hearing. The “Dances with Wolves” actor is accused of sexually assaulting multiple indigenous women and children for at least two decades.

episodes.title: Warrant for 'Dances with Wolves' actor in Canada, more charges expected
episodes.description:
More women are coming forward to report that Nathan Chasing Horse sexually assaulted them. 

A warrant for sexual assault has been issued in Canada by federal authorities, and more charges are on the way, the 8 News Now Investigators have learned.

episodes.title: Warrant for 'Dances with Wolves' actor in Canada, more charges expected
episodes.description: More women are coming forward to report that Nathan Chasing Horse sexually assaulted them. A warrant for sexual assault has been issued in Canada by federal authorities, and more charges are on the way, the 8 News Now Investigators have learned.

episodes.title: More counts filed against movie actor accused of sex crimes
episodes.description: More counts were filed Monday against the former "Dances with Wolves" actor who is accused of sex trafficking and sexual assault. The Criminal Complaint was filed in North Las Vegas Justice Court where hours earlier it was presented to Nathan Chasing Horse during an appearance in a courtroom with a new private attorney who may represent him. The 46-year-old was accompanied by a Los Angeles-based attorney Alexandra Kazarian who works for the high-profile firm Geragos & Geragos. Currently, Chasing Horse remains on record with a public defender.

episodes.title: Member of Fort Peck Reservation in Montana speaks out on arrest of Nathan Chasing Horse
episodes.description: Actor Nathan Chasing Horse is accused of sex trafficking and sexually assaulting indigenous underage girls faced the judge Thursday morning.

episodes.title: Actor Nathan Chasing Horse appears in North Las Vegas courtroom on sexual assault charges
episodes.description: https://www.8newsnow.com/news/local-news/actor-nathan-chasing-horse-appears-in-north-las-vegas-courtroom-on-sexual-assault-charges/

episodes.title: Actor Nathan Chasing Horse accused of raping, physically abusing multiple girls for years in Las Veg
episodes.description: Actor Nathan Chasing Horse is accused of sexually assaulting underage indigenous girls, sex trafficking and spiritual abuse, according to new documents released Wednesday.

episodes.title: 'Dances with Wolves' Actor Accused of Running Cult, Sexually Assaulting Girls in North Las Vegas
episodes.description: Actor Nathan Chasing Horse has been taken into custody on allegations that he ran a cult and sexually assaulted girls. The investigation is believed to have ties to Nevada, and other states as Chasing Horse traveled around the country for ceremonies and even Canada. Chasing Horse is due to make his initial court appearance in North Las Vegas Justice Court Thursday morning at 8 a.m.

episodes.title: 'Dances with Wolves' actor accused of running cult, sexually assaulting girls in North Las Vegas
episodes.description: Actor Nathan Chasing Horse has been taken into custody on allegations that he ran a cult and sexually assaulted girls. The “Dances with Wolves” actor is accused of targeting indigenous girls who were in need, claiming that spirits wanted them to have sex with him, and promising them they’d be part of “The Circle,” the 8 News Now Investigators have learned.
